titleStmt.title: A catalogue of books in folio, consisting of fathers, Latin and English commentaries on the Bible, history, physick, &c. which will be sold by auction on Friday the 31th. of July, 1691: betwixt three and four in the afternoon, at Tom's Coffee-House adjoyning to Ludgate.

A catalogue of books in folio, consisting of fathers, Latin and English commentaries on the Bible, history, physick, &c. which will be sold by auction on Friday the 31th. of July, 1691: betwixt three and four in the afternoon, at Tom's Coffee-House adjoyning to Ludgate.

publicationStmt.publisher: Catalogues are distributed at Mr. Welds the Crown betwixt the Two Temple-Gates in Fleet-street, at Mr. Bennets in St. Paul's Church-Yard, at Mr. Manships the Bull against the Royal Exchange, and at the above-said Coffee-House.,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Possibly a fragment: signed at foot D.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
